Notes: The value of the SMTP MAIL FROM command.
SMTP response status code, see RFC 5321. These codes are issued by a server in response to a client's request made to the server.
The first digit of the Enhanced status code (class), see RFC 3463.
The second digit of the Enhanced status code (subject), see RFC 3463.
The second and third digit of the Enhanced status code, see RFC 3463.
The value of the SMTP MAIL TO command.
